TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RemoteArgumentKind extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the kind of argument that a <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"> represents.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The RemoteArgumentKind enumeration is used by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
An intrinsic data type is a primitive data type (that is, the <xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the type is `true`) or a <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.DateTime>, or <xref:System.DBNull>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind Contract = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind Intrinsic = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True represents an intrinsic data type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind IntrinsicArray = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True represents an T:System.Array?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True that contains elements of an intrinsic data type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind Missing = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True represents the F:System.Type.Missing?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True value. This is the default value for the P:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind?qualifyHint=True&autoUpgrade=True property.
